title: Drawing, "Design for Tapestry with Leaves"
medium: Black crayon, graphite on  cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in margin, lower left:  "Tapestry/Leafstudy (sic)"; along lower edge of image, center: M; across lower margin:  [5 downward-pointing arrows]; across lower margin:  W, B, W, B [indicating color of ground in white or black]; across lower margin:  19, 21, 12, 14; lower left corner:  66: 2 = 33
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Abstract, arrow-shaped hanging leaves (with prominent veins) in black and white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Tapestry with Leaves".
Black crayon, graphite on  cream paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-83.
